sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, Column1, TextWrapper, InfoRow, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Column2, Img, ImgWrap } from './InfoElements'; const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topline, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, dark, dark2, primary}) => { return ( <> {topline} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
